name: Minor Illusion
img: is static unless you use action to move it. Physical interaction reveals illusory effect.

system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Space 3 (small sensory illusion + close range)  
**Supporting Energy:** Time 2 (duration 1 minute)  
**Range:** Close, 30 ft.  
**Duration:** 1 minute  
**Total Cost:** 5 Energy  
**Action:** Simple weave (1 action)  
**Weaving Roll:** Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Create a sound or image at close range no larger than a 5ft cube. Sound can be any noise. Image is static unless you use action to move it. Physical interaction reveals illusory effect.  
**Saving Throw:** Perception vs Space Mastery (to disbelieve if suspicious)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = can include both sound and image (1 hour)
